author: world today us
title: Instagram Implements Nudity Blurring to Safeguard Teenagers and Combat Sextortion - World Today News
text:
Website News: Protecting Teens Against Nudity Exploitation and Image Abuse
Website News: Protecting Teens Against Nudity Exploitation and Image Abuse Instagram Begins Blurring Nudity to Safeguard Teenagers Instagram has taken a significant step to protect young users In light of the increasing concern over the misuse of digital platforms, Instagram has rolled out a new feature to combat the exploitation of teens involving sexual content. The popular image and video-sharing platform has implemented a blurring mechanism specifically targeting inappropriate images or videos shared through private messages. This new precautionary measure aims to promote the safety and well-being of teenagers while using the platform.
Ensuring Increased Online Safety Combating the rising incidence of sextortion With the rise in reports of sextortion cases—an alarming issue where people are coerced into providing explicit images or videos, which are then used for blackmail or exploitation—Instagram acknowledges its responsibility to protect users, especially young individuals, from such malicious activities. By employing content moderation techniques, specifically blurring explicit content shared through personal messages, the platform hopes to hinder the exploitation of teenagers and reduce the potential psychological harm caused by these incidents.
Utilizing Advanced Technology for Enhanced Protection New and improved features to counter illicit image distribution Instagram has leveraged cutting-edge technology to automate the detection and blurring of explicit or pornographic visual content shared within private conversations. This step forward utilizes artificial intelligence to detect potentially compromising images and subsequently obscure them from view. This automated blurring process minimizes the likelihood of accidental exposure to inappropriate material, ensuring user safety and psychological well-being.
Empowering Users to Fight Image Abuse Providing enhanced control over personal content Instagram understands that users should be in command of their personal content and privacy. In alignment with this principle, the platform is also introducing additional user controls to manage their experience. These tools give users the ability to choose who can send them direct messages and limit message requests from unknown accounts, fostering a safer environment and reducing the chances of receiving unsolicited explicit content.
A Collaborative Effort for a Safer Social Media Landscape Coming together to address a global concern Instagram’s recent implementation highlights its strong commitment to ensuring a safer social media experience for all. By incorporating innovative features and advanced content moderation strategies, the platform aims to counter the ongoing challenges of explicit content distribution and the associated abuse. Such measures set an important milestone in promoting digital well-being, protecting young users from harm, and fostering a secure online environment.

author: Helwing Villamizar Jul
title: Wings of Rescue Operates Relief Flights for Texan Pets
text:
DALLAS — This week, nonprofit pet transport charity Wings of Rescue has been operating relief flights in response to catastrophic flooding across Central Texas.
The nonprofit delivers humanitarian and veterinary aid to affected communities and airlifts shelter pets out of crisis zones to safety, where they find adoptive homes.
Key Relief Efforts
Yesterday, Wings of Rescue evacuated 127 pets from overcrowded shelters in Kerrville and neighboring regions. Some pets are now secure in Fort Worth, Texas, thanks to foster care and a partnership with shelters.
Others continued to Best Friends Animal Society in Kanab, Utah, the nation’s largest no-kill animal sanctuary. This work freed up valuable space at local shelters, allowing them to receive animals displaced by the flooding.
Today, Wings of Rescue airlifts 115 more pets from San Angelo, Texas, with similar destinations and goals.
Impact, Community Support
Shelter directors emphasized that without these flights, they would have faced the heartbreaking decision to euthanize existing shelter pets to make room for flood victims.
The operation is a collaboration between Wings of Rescue, Best Friends Animal Society, the Humane Society of North Texas, SPCA of Texas, and Austin Pets Alive!. These flights are saving lives of pets already in shelters and those newly displaced by disaster.
Volunteers and donors play a vital role, providing emergency foster homes, supplies, and funding for flights and relief efforts. Ongoing needs include pet food, medical supplies, and additional foster and adoptive homes.
“Had Wings not flown in, we would’ve had to euthanize the pets already in our care just to make room for flood victims,” Shelter Director, Central Texas.
How You Can Help
- Foster or adopt: Open your home to a rescued pet.
- Donate:
Supportorganizations like Wings of Rescue and Best Friends Animal Society. - Volunteer: Assist with local shelter operations or transport logistics.
Wings of Rescue performs an important part in disaster assistance by airlifting pets and delivering humanitarian aid to afflicted communities. Best Friends Animal Society offers sanctuary and adoption options for evacuated pets, providing a safe place for them to recover before finding new homes.
As part of its disaster relief operations, the Humane Society of North Texas offers emergency foster care and adoption services to evacuated animals.To help control the influx of animals during disasters, the SPCA of Texas supports shelters and disaster response efforts.
Lastly, Austin Pets Alive! collaborates with other organizations as a rescue and coordination partner to ensure the safe placement and transportation of animals in need. Together, these partners form a collaborative network dedicated to supporting communities in need and saving the lives of these furry family members.

author: Sanjugtha Vigneswarasamy /EdgeProp.my
title: Pavonia fuses serenity and modernity in spacious landed homes for families
text:
If you are looking for a landed home nestled in the embrace of nature, yet an arm’s reach away from urban conveniences, check out Pavonia, a newly launched development in Bukit Bandaraya, Shah Alam in Selangor.
Built by award-winning developer Worldwide Property, the property arm of Worldwide Holdings Bhd, Pavonia intertwines modern living with the nostalgic charm of a tropical landscape spanning 8.2 acres. This exclusive low-density leasehold development whispers of a simpler time when families found solace in quiet neighbourhoods surrounded by nature. With only 15 homes per acre and a total of 126 carefully crafted double-storey terraces, Pavonia spells space, tranquility and sustainability.
This premier development not only balances the serenity of nature with contemporary design, but also facilitates the core pillars of interactivity, dynamism, family, community engagement and innovation.
Flexible layouts for evolving needs
The seasoned developer understands that a home should evolve with its inhabitants. That’s why Pavonia is conceptualised as an open layout. Its minimalist design allows flexibility and efficient customisation to cater to the growing and changing needs of your family. Want a cosy reading nook today but envision a home office tomorrow? Its convertible living spaces make it easy for you to maximise space without compromising comfort or style. You will discover the freedom of versatile living—perfect for the dynamic lifestyle most families lead today.
The modern architectural facade design is complemented by large windows that fill your spacious home with natural light and ventilation. Whether it's the soothing sounds of nature from your backyard or the visual pleasure from the aesthetic interiors, Pavonia is all about crafting an emotional connection between you and your living environment to create a sensory experience that not only pleases your eyes but also calms your souls.
Catering to varying family sizes and needs, Pavonia offers intermediate units starting from 1,867 sq ft, end-lots at 1,941 sq ft and expansive corner lots at 2,115 sq ft. All units come with four bedrooms and four bathrooms.
Close to everything, yet far from ordinary
Situated in the established township of Bukit Bandaraya, Pavonia is close to all the essential amenities for an urban lifestyle.
Families will appreciate the convenience of nearby educational institutions, including Universiti Teknologi MARA and Management & Science University (MSU). Healthcare is just around the corner with facilities such as Shah Alam Hospital and Avisena Specialist Hospital. Meanwhile shopping and entertainment are also within easy reach, with hubs like Setia City Mall, i-City and AEON Shah Alam.
If you love the outdoors, you'll find recreational spaces like the Shah Alam National Botanical Park right at your doorstep, ensuring a lifestyle that balances work with play and relaxation.
Within a car ride away via major highways like the New Klang Valley Expressway (NKVE), you can enjoy more vibrant city offerings at Klang, Setia Alam, Subang Jaya, Petaling Jaya and Kuala Lumpur.
Back to good old days of open spaces and community building
Living in Pavonia means waking up to the quiet sounds of nature, reminiscing about childhood days spent playing in the open air, and knowing your children will have those same opportunities. It’s a place where the architecture complements the landscape.
With every detail curated for quality, comfort and harmony, the developer is building not just walls and roofs, but a neighbourhood where families can thrive and grow within the embrace of community bonds.
Additionally, this is a home that prioritises sustainability, using green label-certified products and eco-friendly materials with low emissions. This commitment to responsible resource use and energy efficiency not only promotes a healthier living environment but aligns with global sustainability goals, making it a smart investment for the future.
Returning to the essence of home
In short, Pavonia is more than a modern residential development; it is a return to the essence of home. Its harmonious blend of space, modernity and nature is perfect for families looking to write their next chapter.
For more insights, visit its sales gallery or contact 03–9212 0416 to schedule your personalised tour. More details can also be found on Worldwide Property’s website.

title: 华富科技动能混合C净值上涨6.08%|华富_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
华富科技动能混合型证券投资基金（简称：华富科技动能混合C，代码017968）公布4月23日最新净值，上涨6.08%。
华富科技动能混合C成立于2023年3月9日，业绩比较基准为 收益率×75%+中证综合债券指数收益率×25%。该基金成立以来收益13.63%，今年以来收益35.56%，近一月收益-7.27%，近一年收益70.38%。近一年，该基金排名同类40/7823。
基金经理为沈成。沈成自2023年3月9日管理（或拟管理）该基金，任职期内收益13.63%。
最新定期报告显示，该基金前十大重仓股如下：
